title: Identify the Header Row
text: Before sorting any data, it's crucial to distinguish data entries from column titles. Headers usually contain text giving context to the data below them.

title: Using Google Sheets
text: When using Google Sheets, you can keep certain rows or columns visible while you scroll. This feature is helpful to prevent mixing header rows with main data.
choices: Create a filter and filter out the header row.

title: Purpose of Freezing
text: Freezing a header row ensures that it remains visible regardless of how much data you scroll through, which helps in managing large datasets.
